content: here s a snorlax amigurumi that likes to cuddle up and sleep in his pokeball bed his favorite pastime is taking naps and he ll often use the pokeball top as a blanket this is part of my gotta crochet em all 1 pattern series where i create chibi pokemon that fit into a pokeball that you can open and close his features include sleepy eyes a rotund body and cute little round feet please enjoy this easy to follow free crochet pattern i ve also created a video tutorial in which you can crochet along with me if you wish happy crocheting ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size ** approximately 5in/18cm tall **level ** easy **yarn ** worsted weight acrylic yarn in the colors of aran and blue cotton crochet thread size 3 very small amount for the eye **need to know ** crochet in the round single_crochet half_double_crochet increase decrease ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i d love to see how your project turns out make sure to tag me on **instagram ** @ami_amour 2 **facebook ** ami amour 3 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/pokemon-patterns-by-ami-amour 2 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 3 https //www facebook com/amiamourfan
